SENT.plain: In a sibship of four sisters, two had Burkitt's lymphoma localized to the breast
Their pretreatment Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) serology were not examined
No EBV genome was demonstrated in the tumors using an in situ hybridization technique
The mother showed an abnormal antibody response to EBV infection consisting of elevated IgA and IgG antibody titers to viral capsid antigen (VCA) and high IgG antibody titer to early antigen
Furthermore, one of the two healthy sisters showed elevated IgG antibody titer to VCA
The EBV serology is mimicking the findings in female carriers of the X-linked lymphoproliferative syndrome
